title: 152 Plymouth St
posting_body: IF STUDENTS - each applicant is required to have a parent co-signer.
Awesome 3BD/1BA located on 3rd floor of beautifully maintained building just MINUTES to BSU and Bridgewater Center.
Large bedrooms with ample closet space.
Additional storage may be available if needed.
Cute and spacious eat-in kitchen with large pantry.
The landlords are asking for First,Security, Parking and we charge a 1/2 month Broker Fee.
The Gas and Electric utilities are the tenants responsibility.
Water, sewage/trash, snow removal, and landscaping are included in rent.
